In the system of instruction used in the common schools, the most essential part of education is neglected --the religion of the Bible. Education not only affects to a great degree the life of the student in this world, but its influence extends to eternity. How important, then, that the teachers be persons capable of exerting a right 
                                                                           91
influence! They should be men and women of religious experience, daily receiving divine light to impart to their pupils.
